ivory.core.data.stat

Class DfTableArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.core.data.stat.DfTableArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DfTable

    public class DfTableArray
extends Object
implements DfTable
    Array-based implementation of DfTable. Binary search is used for lookup.
    Author:
    Jimmy Lin, Tamer Elsayed
